caption: However, Churchill was very optimistic about this plan. He approved the plan and hoped that they would implement it immediately. Soon, the committee held another meeting to discuss the plan after the body was discovered. In anticipation, the body would be discovered by the German spies in Spain. They would read the fake letter on the body and believed that Britain would attack Greece, not Sicily. But Hitler had a very professional consultant, any information would be seen by him before being handed over to Hitler. If the consultant did not believe the authenticity of the message, Hitler would definitely not believe it.
